Ganesh Mantra.english: Salutations to Lord Ganesha, remover of obstacles.

Shiva Mantra.english: I bow to Lord Shiva, the supreme reality.

Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra.sanskrit:
ॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम्।
उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान्मृत्योर्मुक्षीय माऽमृतात्॥
Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra.transliteration:
Om Tryambakam Yajāmahe Sugandhiṁ Puṣṭi-vardhanam,
Urvārukamiva Bandhanān Mṛtyor Mukṣīya Mā'mṛtāt.
Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra.english: We worship the three-eyed Lord Shiva who nourishes all beings. May He liberate us from death for the sake of immortality.

Vishnu Mantra.english: I bow to Lord Vishnu, the preserver.

Hanuman Mantra.english: Salutations to Lord Hanuman, the embodiment of strength.

Gayatri Mantra.sanskrit:
ॐ भूर् भुवः स्वः।
तत्सवितुर्वरेण्यं भर्गो देवस्य धीम���ि।
धियो यो नः प्रचोदयात्॥
Gayatri Mantra.transliteration:
Om Bhur Bhuvaḥ Svaḥ,
Tat Savitur Vareṇyaṁ Bhargo Devasya Dhīmahi,
Dhiyo Yo Naḥ Prachodayāt.
Gayatri Mantra.english: We meditate on the divine light of the Sun God. May He guide our intellect in the right direction.
